taskDescription:
A juice dispenser measures <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mn>30</mn>
  <mspace width="thinmathspace"></mspace>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">

  </mrow>
  <mo>×<!-- × --></mo>
  <mn>30</mn>
  <mspace width="thinmathspace"></mspace>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <mtext>cm</mtext>
  </mrow>
  <mo>×<!-- × --></mo>

  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">

</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">30\,{\text{cm}} \times 30\,{\text{cm}} \times 30\,{\text{cm}}</annotation></semantics></math>. How many 375 mL servings will a full dispenser serve?
